original_text: And he that sat was to look upon like a jasper and a sardine stone: and there was a rainbow round about the throne, in sight like unto an emerald.
korean_text: 앉으신 이의 모양이 벽옥과 홍보석 같고 또 무지개가 있어 보좌에 둘렸는데 그 모양이 녹보석 같더라

sentences.original_text: And he that sat was to look upon like a jasper
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 보좌에 앉으신 이는 벽옥과 같았고

sentences.original_text: and there was a rainbow round about the throne,
in sight like unto an emerald.
